sentence: The  burial  was  for  Tariq  Mohammed,  who  was  killed  when  Hamas  attacked  on  October  7.
In  total,  17  people  were  killed  in  this  Palestinian  Bedouin  community  in  Israel.
"Just  as  they  were  returning  to  their  tent,  another  rocket  came  and  killed  them,"  he  said.
The  more  than  1,400  people  killed  included  Jewish  people,  Arabs,  women  and  children.
He  took  us  to  meet  the  family  of  Tariq  Mohammed,  the  man  killed  by  Hamas.
He  was  among  many  killed  in  the  nearby  town  of  Ofakim,  home  to  a  largely  Sephardic  Jewish  community,  when  Hamas  militants  breached  the  border.
"They  shot  him,"  Hamd  El  Kamalat  said.
And  already  around  3,000  people  have  been  killed  by  retaliatory  Israeli  airstrikes,  according  to  the  Palestinian  Health  Ministry.
"When  we  found  out  he  was  dead  we  wanted  to  go  see  him,"  she  said.
